title: FIFA.WC.2014.(13-24 jun).BBC.Match.Of.The.Day.720p
description:
BBC Match Of The Day
====================

2014.06.13
----------
Mark Chapman introduces the best of the action and reaction from the opening game of the 2014 World Cup between Brazil and Croatia. Host nation Brazil are vying for a record-extending sixth world crown and go into the tournament as the team to beat, led by poster boy Neymar.
Alan Shearer and Danny Murphy provide the studio analysis.

2014.06.14
----------
Highlights of the opening match in Group B as Spain face the Netherlands in a repeat of the 2010 World Cup final, as well as Chile's match with Australia, and the Group A clash between Mexico and Cameroon.


2014.06.15
----------
Highlights of England's Group D opener against Italy from Manaus. The Three Lions drew their opening two group matches four years ago, as did Italy, and both will be looking to get off to a winning start this time around.
England's other Group D rivals Uruguay and Costa Rica also get their World Cup campaigns up and running, as do Group C rivals Greece and Colombia, both making their first World Cup appearances of the 21st century. Ivory Coast are also in action against Japan.

2014.06.16
----------
Highlights of three World Cup matches, which saw Switzerland play Ecuador, France meet Honduras and Argentina take on Bosnia-Herzegovina.


2014.06.17
----------
Highlights of the two opening games in Group G between Germany and Portugal, and Ghana against the USA. Plus action from the Group F match as Iran take on Nigeria.

2014.06.18
----------
Highlights of Brazil's Group A meeting with Mexico in Fortaleza. Neymar opened the scoring in a 2-0 Brazil win when the two countries met at the same venue in 2013. There is also action from both Group H opening matches, Belgium take on Algeria in Belo Horizonte, while Russia are in action against South Korea.

2014.06.19
----------
Highlights of the matches in Group B between Spain and Chile and Australia against the Netherlands, plus the Group A clash as Cameroon take on Croatia in Manaus.

2014.06.20
----------
Highlights of three World Cup matches, which saw England take on Uruguay, Colombia meet Ivory Coast and Japan play Greece.

2014.06.21
----------
Highlights of Italy's Group D meeting with Costa Rica in Recife. The Azzurri won the only previous meeting between the two countries 20 years ago, Giuseppe Signori scoring in a 1-0 win. Group E seeds Switzerland meet France, with the last three meetings between the clubs having ended in draws, including their 2006 World Cup meeting. Ecuador and Honduras are also in action.

2014.06.22
----------
Highlights from three World Cup matches, as Argentina take on Iran, Nigeria play Bosnia-Herzegovina and Germany meet Ghana.

2014.06.23
----------
Highlights of the matches in Group H between Belgium and Russia, and Korea and Algeria, plus the Group G clash between USA and Portugal.

2014.06.24
----------
Dan Walker introduces the best of the action and reaction from the day's concluding matches in Groups A and B. Hosts Brazil met Cameroon in Brasilia, while Mexico and Croatia went head-to-head in Recife with a likely qualification place at stake. It was likely to be a similar scenario in the Group B fixture between Netherlands and Chile, while defending champions Spain met tournament outsiders Australia.
